data.strFullDescription:
Aseprite is a pixel art tool that lets you create 2D animations for videogames.

[h2]Features[/h2]

[list]
[*] Compose sprites using [b]layers & frames[/b] as separated concepts
[*] Create images in [b]RGBA[/b] or [b]Indexed[/b] color modes 
[*] Open/Save [b]GIF animations[/b], sequence of PNG files, etc.
[*] A [b]timeline[/b] where you can copy/move layers, frames, or specific images
[*] Animation tools: Real-time animation preview, [b]onion skinning[/b], tag frames
[*] Pixel art tools: shading, pixel perfect strokes, RotSprite rotation, tiled mode, filled contour
[*] Export/import [b]sprite sheets[/b]
[*] A command line interface to automate conversion and sprite sheets generation 
[*] Updates for the whole v1.x series up to v1.9.
[/list]
data.strSnippet: Aseprite is a pixel-art tool to create 2D animations, sprites, and any kind of graphics for games.
